import React from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faFacebook, faInstagram } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons'; import "../styles/Contact.css"; const Contact = () => { const socialMediaStyle = { color: '#0d4d9d' }; // Custom style for social media icons and text return (

Get in Touch!

The Slip Lomita

24503 Narbonne Ave.

Lomita, CA 90717

Phone: (424) 376-6947

The Slip Redondo Beach

120 N. International Boardwalk

Redondo Beach, CA 90277

Phone: (310) 376-8910

Email:

info@theslipbar.com

Social Media:

Facebook

Instagram

); } export default Contact;
